REST IN PEACE AND "SEMPER FI"  TO A MARINE HERO...

First black Marine Jim Rundles passes away at the age of 94 on March 13, 2014. Jim Rundles came into the Marine Corps at a time that all branches were segregated. He helped bring about the modern thought by Marines that all Marines are just a shade of green. This man survived Montford Point and World War II.

Brian Gardepe
Startup Advisor
February 2, 2016, Brian worked with Kimberlie in different groups

As a young entrepreneur one of the most important people I would meet in founding my first venture backed technology was Kimberlie. Over 20 years I have had the privilege of her advice and the opportunity to help out where I can in the many different roles and interests she gets involved in.Strategy and vision couple with focus and discipline have made her so valuable to her colleagues, her friends and her teams. Whether at the Board, as an Advisor or CEO of Tiatros, Kimberlie is invaluable as a calm and measured leader who gets through challenges.

Siddhartha Mukherjee
(Not looking for a change) In love with ruby, go, angualr, react, nodejs
December 11, 2014, Kimberlie managed Siddhartha directly

For over 3 1/2 years Siddhartha Mukherjee led Tiatros' engineering team, which created and brought to market the first easy-to-use, highly customizable transactional site for clinical workflows. Siddhartha was a critically important member of our leadership team, and the engineers who worked for him admire and respect him. He did a great job developing and managing his team.  We would welcome Siddhartha back any time, and I would back any project that he was involved in. He did a great job for us.  I highly recommend Siddhartha Mukherjee.
